name: chicagotribune
text: The graduated income tax plan appearing on ballots this fall in Illinois would lower the average tax rate for 97% of the state's wage earners and is projected to raise $3.4 billion in the next budget year. Here's what to know about the proposed amendment https://t.co/zAUpxYahjb

name: chicagotribune
text:
RT @ChicagoSports: .@BradBiggs: Bears coach Matt Nagy on Sunday wouldn’t commit to Nick Foles as the team's starting quarterback moving forward. But it’s Foles' job now to be that guy who raises the level of play around him when the Bears encounter better opponents.

https://t.co/ySqnleMJSL

name: chicagotribune
text: RT @PWSullivan: As the White Sox and Cubs enter the postseason amid plenty of skepticism, the odds of an all-Chicago World Series are long. But it’s 2020, so anything’s possible. https://t.co/lIVCkyZBUC
